data.enText: a person who is skilled at planning things, especially military activities
data.chText: 战略家；善于筹划部署的人

tr: an expert in strategy (especially in warfare)

example.ex: Military strategists had devised a plan that guaranteed a series of stunning victories.
example.tran: 军事战略家们制订出的计划确保了一连串的辉煌胜利。

value.def: A strategist is someone who is skilled in planning the best way to gain an advantage or to achieve success, especially in war.
value.tran: (尤指军事)战略家，善于策划的人
